department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## EC015-250411 - Request for Proposal (RFP)
### Fredericton Research and Development Center (FRDC) B170 Dust Collector

## Request Details
* **Reference Number:** WS4682864962-Doc4682881570
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4682864962
* **Publication Date:** 2024-07-12
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-08-06T14:00:00 (expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-08-16
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None

## Project Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a Mechanical Engineering Consultant to review the existing dust collection system at the Fredericton Research and Development Center (FRDC). The consultant will compare the existing system with other technologies, make recommendations for corrective actions or replacement, and prepare design documents to ensure a safe work environment.

## Additional Information
* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Regions of Opportunity:** New Brunswick

## Participating Firms
The following five firms are invited to participate in this RFP:
* WSP Canada Inc.
* Pageau Morel et associés inc.
* Englobe Corp.
* Tweedie & Associates Consulting
* Stantec Consulting Ltd.

## Contact Information
* **Name:** Carlos Castillo Nieto
* **Email:** [carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** None
* **Fax:** None

Note that all information and details have been preserved, and only rephrased and reorganized to make it more professional and concise.
